channel.title: 1% chance psycho king at the start
channel.description:
Hi! quick suggestion:
If there is 33% to get a Good King, 33% to get a Neutral king, and 33% to get an evil king...
What if you add a 1% to get a Psycho king at the start of the game?
Of course if there is Psycho king, there would be no other Neutral Killer.
Also this idea can be good since King can claim kills now.
Hope you like it.
Good night!

item.title: 1% chance psycho king at the start

item.title: 1% chance psycho king at the start
item.dc:creator: orangeandblack5
item.description:
Was about to dislike until you mentioned the “King can kill anyways now”.

I’m not sure I like the idea of that slim chance, but it would certainly be interesting.

Read full topic
